title: Apprentice Recruiter (Remote | U.S. Hours | Full-Time)
job_overview:
Start with Mentorship, Grow into a Top Recruiter.
Looking for a real career path? Not just another VA gig?
This is a unique opportunity to work directly with the founder of one of the most established executive search firms in the U.S. construction industry — The Birmingham Group.
We’ll teach you how to recruit like a top producer. You’ll start by sourcing talent and setting up client calls, and if you’re consistent, you’ll earn bonuses on interviews and placements, and eventually grow into a high-level recruiter with long-term upside.
________________________________________
About the Firm:
• In business since 1967
• Led by Brian Binke, the #1 billing owner in the world for MRINetwork (800+ offices)
• Specializes in placing PMs, Superintendents, Executives for U.S. construction companies
• Known for training high-performers and helping them grow fast
________________________________________
What You’ll Do:
• Call and message U.S.-based candidates (scripts provided)
• Help schedule client interviews and manage calendars
• Use recordings to help format resumes and candidate profiles
• Log notes and track activity in our recruiting system (PCRecruiter)
• Support sourcing, follow-up, and communication
________________________________________
Perks & Compensation:
• Base Salary: $1,200–$1,800/month USD
• Bonuses: $20–$25 per interview + $250–$500 per placement
• Full U.S. recruiting systems + scripts, sequences, and training provided
• Learn directly from the CEO + growth into full recruiter role
• Long-term growth track: the right person could lead a team or even earn partnership
________________________________________
Who This is For:
• Strong English speaker with good writing
• Friendly, energetic, focused
• Not afraid to call and follow up
• Interested in recruiting, sales, or growth-oriented careers
• Wants to build something and work with a supportive leader
________________________________________
Bonus If You Have:
• Prior recruiting, phone sales, or U.S. client experience
• A strong, clear speaking voice
• Experience using tools like Jasper, Calendly, or CRM systems
________________________________________
To Apply:
• Send your resume (PDF or Word)
• Include 2–3 lines about why you’re interested in recruiting
• Optional: Add a short voice or video intro (Loom or Vocaroo)
________________________________________
You’ll Get:
• Mentorship
• Opportunity
• Real tools
• Real pay
• And a chance to build a career
We’re not looking for perfect. We’re looking for hungry, honest, and hard-working.
If that’s you — apply today.
